org.webcurator.core.archive.file
Class FileArchive

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.archive.BaseArchive
      org.webcurator.core.archive.file.FileArchive
All Implemented Interfaces:
Archive
public class FileArchive
extends BaseArchive

A specific file-based archiver. Archives to a configurable filesystem

AParker

submitToArchive

public java.lang.String submitToArchive(java.lang.String targetInstanceOID,
                                        java.lang.String SIP,
                                        java.util.Map xAttributes,
                                        java.util.List<ArchiveFile> files)
                                 throws FileArchiveException
Parameters:
targetInstanceOID - The target instance oid
SIP - The METS xml structure for completion and archival
xAttributes - Any extra attributes that may be required for archival (not needed for this File Archiver)
files - A list of files (@see org.webcurator.core.archive.ArchiveFile) to archive
Returns:
A unique archive identifier
Throws:
FileArchiveException

getCustomDepositFormDetails

public CustomDepositFormResultDTO getCustomDepositFormDetails(CustomDepositFormCriteriaDTO criteria)
This implementation of Archive module does not require a custom form to be filled before archiving any harvest. Therefore, this method will return null.

Parameters:
criteria - Provides parameters that are required for DAS to make this decision.
Returns:
The response DTO that indicates whether a custom form is required, and if so, the location/content of the custom form.
